name: NGINX Proxy Manager - Dark Theme
description:
- A Dark Theme designed for NGINX Proxy Manager to save your eyes from the bright white default GUI. 
- A combination of Black / Blue / Pink / Orange for the color scheme. 
- I made this in a few hours during a late night; It's still a work in progress and may contain a few items that still need to be styled. For now it is an immense improvement to the default GUI.
additional_info:
Important: 
- As there is no way for me to determine the appropriate URL / IP Address others are using for NGINX Proxy Manager it will require you to adjust the URL the style applies to manually.
- You can do this within the Stylish settings, or by directly editing the CSS value for @-moz-document domain to the appropriate URL / IP Address

Changing the Default Avatar: 
- You can set the default avatar that is displayed by changing the background-image in the .avatar class at the top of this CSS. It is conveniently labeled with a comment.
